title: WTB: N172 McTamany and Peeples Columbus
author: shernan30

posts.post_title: WTB: N172 McTamany and Peeples Columbus
posts.post_content:
I'm looking for the 2 outdoor poses of Columbus Solons players. Not worried about technical grade, but want a strong image and not rebacked or skinned. The two players are McTamany and Peeples. Must be Columbus not Brooklyn. If you have either available send me a PM or email (shernan30@gmail.com) with scans and asking price.

Steven


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk

I have a Peeples Brooklyn that someone wrote "Columbus" on the reverse. Does  that count? :) Cool pose in full catchers gear. Good luck with your search.
